Global Warming:

A rise in average global temperatures from the Earth's surface over this century of about 1.5 degrees Fahrenheit is now very likely, largely because of emissions of greenhouse gases from human activity, finds the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change's (IPCC) Fifth Assessment Report, released today.

Reducing emissions from transportation

One way to help reduce the effects of climate change is to cut down on emissions from transportation. This can be done by driving less, carpooling, taking public transport, cycling or walking more.

Climate_Concept.0: The greenhouse effect is a process that occurs when gases in the Earth's atmosphere trap energy from the sun. Image_Description.30: A funny image that relates to this is a picture of someone holding a sign that says "I'm with stupid" next to the Paris climate agreement. This is because some people believe that the agreement is pointless and will not do anything to stop climate change.
Image_Description.31: A funny image that relates to this would be a person driving a car that runs on alternative fuel, such as electric or solar power. The driver would be surrounded by a big cloud of pollution coming from the vehicle in front of them!

Image_Description.33: a picture of a car with solar panels on it

The scientist on the left says "I don't know what this is supposed to be." The scientist on the right says, "Me neither, I think

Image_Caption.0: "I'm not just a solar panel, I'm a people person!"
Image_Caption.1: "Fossil fuels are so old, even dinosaurs use renewable energy!"
Image_Caption.2: This dragon is not afraid to let its smoggy emissions fly!
Image_Caption.3:
I put a stick of deodorant in my pocket just in case I get lucky


"Just in case I get lucky."
Image_Caption.4: This person is really into saving the earth!
Image_Caption.5: This private jet is getting ready to spray some chemicals into the atmosphere to help combat climate change. Let's hope they know what they're doing!
Image_Caption.6: Can't we just turn this thing up to eleven and be done with it?
Image_Caption.7: "Mmmm....I'm just gonna sit here and photosynthesize for a bit."
Image_Caption.8: The tree is hugging the windmill because it wants to get away from the turbine.
Image_Caption.9: "I thought going green would save me money, but I'm still waiting for my electricity bill to go down."
Image_Caption.10: "I'm harnessing the power of the sun to save the planet!"
Image_Caption.11: Both the solar panel and wind turbine are renewable energy sources, but they're also both spinning really fast!
Image_Caption.12: This person is powered by the sun... and their own hot air!
Image_Caption.13: Why didn't the chicken cross the road?Because he was caught in a lie.
Image_Caption.14: Don't worry, this plant was never alive.
Image_Caption.15: "I'm protesting the use of fossil fuels... but I'm also kind of hoping this gas mask will help me avoid that awkward office small talk."
Image_Caption.16: "I'm just trying to get my daily recommended intake of trees!"
Image_Caption.17: "Don't worry, global warming will be good for my tan!"
Image_Caption.18: "I told you we should have went left!"
Image_Caption.19: This person is clearly in over their head. They should have just taken the bus.
Image_Caption.20: The bird tweets, "I'm generating renewable energy!" as the windmill rotates.
Image_Caption.21: This person is clearly not interested in getting where they're going anytime soon.
Image_Caption.22: "You know what they say, when it rains, it pours."
Image_Caption.23: Why did the chicken go renewable? So it could keep running away from people trying to catch it!
Image_Caption.24: A tree hugger finally found his true calling.
Image_Caption.25: I'm not afraid of the sun, I'm just prepared for the apocalypse.
Image_Caption.26: "What do you mean we're out of kibble?!"
Image_Caption.27: The environmental protection agency is now trading in carbon credits!
Image_Caption.28: "I'm not just a pretty face, I also generate electricity."

"I'm not going to let this garbage get the best of me!"

Image_Caption.15: Greenhouse gas emissions are like farts--we all do them, but nobody wants to talk about it!
Image_Caption.16: "I'm not worried about climate change. I'll just stick my head in the sand and pretend it's not happening."
Image_Caption.17: "It turns out global warming is expensive!"
Image_Caption.18: "Cargo shorts and plaid shirts: the official uniform of coaster enthusiasts!"
Image_Caption.19: The polar bear looked around and realized that he was totally screwed.
